title: Great cover up : animal camouflage
brief_description: Camouflage is one of the most important means of survival in the animal kingdom for predator and prey alike. This film describes several forms of disguise and deceptive behaviour, using as examples a variety of animals in a variety of habitats. Suitable for Mid-Upper primary level students. Teacher’s guide included.
